mapper.sql: DETAIL_TASK_ID detailTaskId, SOLICIT_DETAIL_ID solicitDetailId, USER_ID userId, USER_CONCLUSION userConclusion, USER_OPINION userOpinion, SIGN_TIME signTime, FILL_TIME fillTime, TASK_ACTION taskAction, PARENT_ID parentId, IS_DELETED isDeleted, CREATER creater, CREATE_TIME createTime, MODIFIER modifier, MODIFY_TIME modifyTime

ahsdu.DETAIL_TASK_ID detailTaskId, ahsdu.SOLICIT_DETAIL_ID solicitDetailId, ahsdu.USER_ID userId, ahsdu.USER_CONCLUSION userConclusion, ahsdu.USER_OPINION userOpinion, ahsdu.SIGN_TIME signTime, ahsdu.FILL_TIME fillTime, ahsdu.TASK_ACTION taskAction, ahsdu.PARENT_ID parentId, ahsdu.IS_DELETED isDeleted, ahsdu.CREATER creater, ahsdu.CREATE_TIME createTime, ahsdu.MODIFIER modifier, ahsdu.MODIFY_TIME modifyTime
mapper.select:
select
from AEA_HI_SOLICIT_DETAIL_USER where DETAIL_TASK_ID = #{id} AND IS_DELETED = '0'

select
from AEA_HI_SOLICIT_DETAIL_USER ahsdu LEFT JOIN AEA_HI_SOLICIT_DETAIL ahsd on ahsdu.SOLICIT_DETAIL_ID = ahsd.SOLICIT_DETAIL_ID where ahsdu.SOLICIT_DETAIL_ID = #{solicitDetailId} AND ahsdu.IS_DELETED = '0' AND ahsd.IS_DELETED = '0'

select
from AEA_HI_SOLICIT_DETAIL_USER ahsdu LEFT JOIN AEA_HI_SOLICIT_DETAIL ahsd on ahsdu.SOLICIT_DETAIL_ID = ahsd.SOLICIT_DETAIL_ID LEFT JOIN AEA_HI_SOLICIT ahs on ahs.SOLICIT_ID = ahsd.SOLICIT_ID where ahs.SOLICIT_ID = #{solicitId} AND ahsdu.IS_DELETED = '0' AND ahsd.IS_DELETED = '0'
mapper.update:
update AEA_HI_SOLICIT_DETAIL_USER
DETAIL_TASK_ID = #{detailTaskId},
SOLICIT_DETAIL_ID = #{solicitDetailId},
USER_ID = #{userId},
USER_CONCLUSION = #{userConclusion},
USER_OPINION = #{userOpinion},
SIGN_TIME = #{signTime},
FILL_TIME = #{fillTime},
TASK_ACTION = #{taskAction},
PARENT_ID = #{parentId},
IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted},
CREATER = #{creater},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime},
MODIFIER = #{modifier},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime},
where DETAIL_TASK_ID = #{detailTaskId}
